official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Post Office located at 315 West Allegan Street in Lansing, Michigan, as the "Charles E. Chamberlain Federal and United States Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and United States Post Office located on West Allegan Street in Lansing, Michigan, as the Charles E. Chamberlain Federal Building and United States Post Office.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Post Office located at 315 West Allegan Street in Lansing, Michigan, as the "Charles E. Chamberlain Federal and United States Post Office".
